content:
I'm happy to help you with finding a hotel near your conference venue in Chicago! However, I have to say that I'm a large language model, I don't have the ability to recall previous conversations or maintain personal relationships, so I didn't know you visited your parents last weekend. But I'm glad to hear that you had a great time with them!

Now, let's focus on finding a great hotel for your trip to Chicago. Can you please provide me with more details about the conference venue? What's the name of the venue, and approximately what neighborhood or area of Chicago is it located in? Additionally, what's your budget for the hotel, and what amenities are you looking for (e.g. free Wi-Fi, fitness center, breakfast included)?
